summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2534 for the improvement of Twenty-fifth Avenue North, from Helen Street to East Galer Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks therein and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 29422, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
